betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You probably started with all these guidebooks in your inventory. Probably want a place to store them. Here is one of 3 options.

[quest]Akashic Tome[/quest]
- Add a book: Craft with Tome in crafting grid
- Change book: §3Right Click§r and select which book you want
- Transform back into tome: §2Left Click§r air
- Remove a book: §5Sneak§r and press §5"drop"§r key while book is transformed

[quest]Bookcase[/quest]
- You can §3Right Click§r an empty spot in the bookcase with a book to add it in directly, and §3Shift + Right Click§r to take it out.
- Right click the bookcase with any other item to open up the interface
- You can click and drop books into a slot or §3§r§2Shift + Click§r them in.

[quest]Book Binder[/quest]
- §3Right Click§r to open up the book binder. You can then click and drop books into a slot or §b§r§3§r§2Shift + Click§r them in.
- Once a book is in the binder you can then §b§r§3Right Click§r the book in the binder to access that book.
